entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have collected the Collector's Exhibit and met with the collector.
entries.journal_entry_description: Collect the Comlink Exhibit and then meet with the collector.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Well, hello.  Thank you so much for answering the call so soon.  Please stand-by for a shuttle.  You will be transported momentarily.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Go to Mos Eisley on Tatooine and meet with the collector.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: You can collect objects throughout the galaxy for fame and fortune.  Follow the waypoint to the collector for more details.  This concludes my tasks and I must be off to help others.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: I am really sorry for the bother.  I think I have found something that will interest you. Inspect the Collection Exhibit to continue.
